articles.author: Melissa Rudy
articles.title: Heart attack death risk can double during heat waves and high pollution, study finds: ‘A perfect storm’ - Fox News
articles.description: Some people may have twice the risk of dying from a heart attack amid heat waves and high levels of fine particulate pollution, said an American Heart Association study. A cardiologist weighed in.
articles.content:
Certain groups of people may have twice the risk of dying from a heart attack
